# MarkB Project

Market basket analysis has been used everywhere. This just some summarization of many methods that exist out there. 


## Data

* groceries --> [kaggle 1](https://www.kaggle.com/irfanasrullah/groceries)
* market basket optimization --> [kaggle 2](https://www.kaggle.com/roshansharma/market-basket-optimization)
* instacart market basket analysis --> [kaggle 3](https://www.kaggle.com/c/instacart-market-basket-analysis/data)
* market basket analysis --> [kaggle 4](https://www.kaggle.com/apmonisha08/market-basket-analysis)
* basket optimisation --> [kaggle 5](https://www.kaggle.com/dragonheir/basket-optimisation)
* market basket analysis uas unsika --> [kaggle 6](https://www.kaggle.com/kurohana/market-basket-analysis-uas-unsika)
